data_formats: Widely used file formats (Spreadsheet, JSON, GeoJSON, SHP, GPX, KML, XML, TIFF, MP3, MP4, etc.)
digitaf_data_wp: WP2 - Tools for practitioners and farm advisors
name: MIMOSA: dataset behind the interactive tool for selection of nut harvesting machinery in agroforestry context (MachInes en Methodes voor de OogSt van noten in Agroforestry)
description:
This dataset contains all the information which is used to run the calculations in the interactive decision support tool "MIMOSA" (MachInes en Methodes voor de OogSt van noten in Agroforestry), intended to select nut harvesting machinery in an agroforestry context. This tool is developed for use in Belgium and The Netherlands, and is currently only available in Dutch.
Access to the tool itself: https://bdbnet.bdb.be/pls/apex/f?p=147:10
data_ownership: Flanders Research Institute for Agriculture, Fisheries and Food (ILVO)
data_type_other: Machinery manufacturers price catalogues and technical manuals
spatial_scales_other: in fact, the scale is not relevant. In the tool, you can select any scale for which you want to select havest machinery
access_barrier: Access to the data needs to be granted (e.g. dataset owner needs to give permission after user registration; dataset owner sends data after receiving a request email)
digitaf_data_used: It is useful related to WP2 - T2.1 on technical issues
